title: Bloomberg Markets: Ford CTO on `City of Tomorrow' Mobility
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Ford CTO on `City of Tomorrow' Mobility
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Ken Washington VP/ChiefTechnology Officer Ford Motor Co. Discussing City of Tomorrow program on expanding mobility services worldwide and creating "microtransit" to move people in a shared way.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
